content.detailedDescription: El evento ocurrio en la noche estaba sentada en la cama revisando mi celular y hacia calor me pare frente a la ventana y vi unas luces que pasaban iban a velocidad muy lenta, como si buscaran algo,de repente el objeto se quedo inmovil en un sitio, las luces era brillantes entre azules y blancas giraban como las bolas de discoteca unas en la parte superior y en la inferior su forma era como un sombrero al reves o dos moldes de pastel redondos uno pequeño abajo y uno arriba, trate grabarlos y no se veia nada incluso se escondian tras las nubes cuando trataba de fotografiarlos o grabarlos, luego desaparecieron y me dio un fuerte dolor de cabeza. no se si tenga algo que ver, pero durante esos dias estaba leyendo y viendo videos en youtube sobre una raza de estos seres que se llaman (los reptilianos). hay un escritor español que se llama david parcerisa y conoce el tema, para este autor los seres humanos somos una mezcla de estos seres con el mono. bueno espero que esta informacion les sirva de algo.
content.summary: El evento ocurrio en la noche,  hacia calor me pare cerca de la ventana y de repente vi la nave se veia muy lejos no pude distinguir su tamaño, su forma era como un sombrero al reves

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
 - relaxing next to pool in my backyard on a sunday morning.

2. what made you first notice the object?
 - when i recorded it, i basically wanted to test out the zoom feature on my lg g3 smart phone, and i saw the "plane" and thought it was a good opportunity to test it on a faraway object in the sky on a clear day.  so i saw the "plane" and began recording it.  since i was still learning the feature and trying to line up the lens to the object, i had some moments of shakiness with the phone and video filming.  i really didn't take notice to it to much, and decided to review the footage when i got the chance. that chance wasn't until three weeks later, after i had returned from some travelling up north to montana and yellowstone park.  what made me review the video in mid-september was that i actually was wondering if it was a plane or not, so i took a closer look at the footage.  

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 - a plane
 
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
 - the object traveled from east to west, but looked at though maybe was heading toward a ne direction.  not sure, but it travel along what looked like to be a straight line.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
 - during - thought i was filming a plane and testing my zoom.
 - after (reviewing the footage) - that is when i found it to be interesting and excited in what i just captured.  i'm still not incline to say it is "extra-terrestial", but it sure isn't some aircraft i am familiar with, especially being in a navy a-6e squadron for 3 yrs.  of all the airplanes i've seen, i've never seen something like this before, and trust me, i've seen a lot.  this one doesn't seem to have wings, but maybe small fins on the tail - which would lead me to believe it could be a drone of sorts.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
 - traveled out of my visible sight and behind houses and bushes.
content.summary: I thought i was filming a plane, but after viewing, it doesn't look like one.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck at the rear of my house that faces east.I stood to adjust the deck umbrella when i noticed a bright red light moving toward my location at a low altitude from the southeast.The light reminded me of a road flare,slightly glowing.I watched it pass by at a seemingly slow speed, slowly turning toward the northeast in an arc gaining altitude,eventually fading from sight.The sighting lasted about a minute.The size seemed to me about the size of a golf ball if it was held at arms length.The object appeared to be a fireball or emitting flame and making no sound.
content.summary: Observed bright red fireball moving from south east to north east in a slow arc slightly above tree top,no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
While reviewing home security camera recording i saw 2 objects that seemed to arch from over the back of the house then disappear into the ground in what seemed to be in my back yard. i was watching video taken about 5 minutes before so went out to look for whatever it was but found nothing.

i ran the clip as slow as it would go(1/8th speed) and it made it through the frames in what seemed like a fraction of a second. i went out to look to see if anything/anyone was in the front yard  that could have thrown the objects over the house but all was quiet and nothing was there.

the security dvr is a dvr8-4500 with 720p day/night camera. the system is about 6 weeks old and i review every second of recordings each day and have not seen anything like this on it since installing.

i dont really think this qualifies as a ufo but it beats the heck out of me as to what it was.

i dont expect this to be of much interest to you but thought it was curious enough that i didn't just want to delete or overwrite it so i copied it off onto a jump drive to save and the original on the swann dvr will likely be overwritten in about a week to 10 days. unless there was something else in the area this morning i expect you will just junk the report and video - do as you see fit.


david armstrong...

i dont really understand the extent of the"release?" at the bottom of the page but do as you desire with the report and video just please dont make it public with my name attached.
content.summary: Saw 2 objects arch over the back of house and dissapear into the ground while reviewing security camera footage, nothing found on ground.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 12:30, approaching bowman field airport (small, used for private,smaller aircraft) i observed a large jet. it was flying very, very low, no visible markings and had a weird black tail. nothing conspiracy here, just took a pic of the unusual plane, as it never ascended and seemed to teeter on its side very slowly. i took one random picture on my galaxy s6+.
just looked at it, hours later, and was stunned to see 3 distinct 'crafts' or lit planes. they were not visible at the time. i heard the very low hum from the original plane, that's all. the light in the middle appears to have a visible chemtrail; i'm sure it's explainable. but the distinct, bright oval on top is intriguing. welcome any and all feedback.
content.summary: Took one pic of unusual jet and captured 3 glowing objects, not seen or heard at time.

content.detailedDescription:
12.45am september 18th friday. 
smoking cig outside and get urge to look up. stand up and look straight up. get very calm feeling for no reason and even begin smiling; feeling very peaceful and even euphoric. suddenly yellowish green disc light appears in front of me stationary,  and then flys directly over me until out of site behind the top of the house. was probably only a couple hundred feet away. made no noise. i reported it to mufon. it was awesome and amazing and i can't stop thinking about it.
content.summary: Smoking cig outside and get urge to look up. stand up and look straight up. get very calm feeling for no reason. suddenly yellowish green disc light appears out of thin air in front of me stationary,  and then flys directly over me.

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to look south as i was walking near my home in the country. i thought i was seeing vehicle tail lights above the trees on the hill, but that's not possible. these lights were too bright to be stars, there was no distortion as there would have been for a distant object(like an airplane near the horizon). 
the light on the left(east) was further away from the other two. there seemed to be a gleam of white light that surrounded and connected all three. the 'gleam' was more pronounced between the two that were farther apart. they were in a straight line from east to west. they blinked out one by one, from east to west. i detected no movement.
the lights themselves were orange with black outline with the intense white light surrounding them all.
i felt strangely excited, having never witnessed such a thing before.
content.summary: Three orange lights at the horizon, blinked out one by one.

content.detailedDescription: Shop yard getting rig ready.Got glacoma atracted by light, it went straight up down side to side wobbled.Facinated.Was happy till i enlarged picture and saw two then sad. gone.  about 30 mins later there was a large fireball im sure others saw it like a shooting star only in the atmosphere ive been driving for 26 years i know the difference it was huge like 50 metiorites burning up . when you see picture just under and to the right is a sphere green on top and bottom black in center i felt they were rivals
content.summary: Drive truck saw it moved like on tv took pic

content.detailedDescription: A while back i made some posting about a dell computer that i received for free at a local church...And how that pc involved many numeric synchronicites etc....Well here is another one...It involves a famous ufo sighting at chicago's o'hare airport on november 7th, 2006...I do not recall the exact date it occurred, but sometime near 11-07-2006 i had a powerful day dream while taking a afternoon nap about a ufo hovering over and airport gate....It was not regarding a particular airport, just a generic airport...I did not think anything of it until a few years after that i was browsing the web about ufos just for fun....I found info about the chicago airport ufo sighting, and saw that it hovered over gate 17...Since the number 17 is so influential in my life, it caught my attention....I also found it interesting that the event occurred on the exact 30th anniversary of the making of a franklin mint calendar art medallion that is very dear to me, it was made 11-07-1976 for the year 1977 and was sculpted by earnest lauser, a famous sculptor. well, the dell pc i got at the church was made on november 17, 2009 which was 1,861 days before my 30th wedding anniversary on 12-22-2014. eanest lauser died on 12-12-2011 exactly 1,861 days after the chicago airport ufo event of 11-07-2006!!!!
content.summary: I had a strong daydream during a nap of a ufo over and airport gate

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone at mufon hq by field investigator
l. flechtner on 9/18/15
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
on january 3rd, 2012, at 6:30 pm we were watching a meteor shower and noticed a cluster of stars, then the stars moved slowly and stopped, then they slowly moved together as a cluster, across the sky. when they moved they blocked the stars behind them. i'd like to know if anybody else saw them.
content.summary: On january 3rd, 2012, at 6:30 pm we were watching a meteor shower and noticed a cluster of stars, then the stars moved slowly and stopped

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed on sept 5th, 2015 at 12:20 midnite while standing on porch saying goodbye to friends,and noticed  over their car in a northeast direction, high in the sky was a flashing light with white & red lights.It was very high in the sky, but you could still see it flashing. i thought it was an airplane, but it didn't move. i observed for over 25 minutes and it only stayed in the same area of sky. i thought i saw it moved slightly up and down a couple of times, but it mostly stayed stationary. i didn't know what it could be, so i decided to check the next nite. the next nite i went out 8pm and there it was again in the same direction, but the position was different, a little more north. it was the same flashing lights and stationary position. i observed this for 2 hrs. it happened again the next nite sept 7th same lights but now it was in the northwest sky. i then took video with my cellphone and took some pics. on sept 8th the happened again, the light in the west and stayed for hours. on sept 9th the light moved back to the east. sept 10-12 couldn't observe we had cloudy,rainy weather. again on sept 13th the light was back in the east. same for sept 14th, but on sept 15th it was back in western sky, i took pics this time.
on sept 16th, i observed 2 objects, one in the west and one in the east!! same lights and position. sept 17th-observed in western sky, i thought this was really getting weird so i took more video and pictures. each time i took video & pics i tried to stop when planes were in the area. i reviewed the pics and you can see different shapes and colors on each one from the night of sept 17th.  my husband and daughter also observed. today is sept 18th and i will check the sky again tonite.
content.summary: Sept 5th-12:20am- observed flashing lights while standing on porch,it was flashing red & white but did move in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out side my home as i had just moved my vehicle before workers came to my home to do a kitchen tiling job. i just happen to look up into the sky and notice an object in the sky that appeared to be stationary with very bright light, made no sounds, and i did understand why it would be there. i first thought it might be an air force, navy, or army helicopter but there were no running lights like a normal aircraft and it did not appear move at all like any flying vehicle i know of. it appeared to be just setting up there in the same place for as long as i looked at it. i took three photos of it with my cellphone and in two of the pictures it looked the same but in the third picture it appeared to have a different shape. after i took the pictures i went into my home to continue preparing for the workers and never seen the object again. as for the cellphone photos i downloaded them to my computer in hopes of a clearer look and in doing that i was able to see that it was something i had not seen before. i am really interested to see if this turns out to be something not of this world.  in closing out this report i must also tell you that i live fairly close to langley afb and i am well aware of what a normal aircraft look and sound like as i am a retired military soldier.
content.summary: Item appear to be standing still in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Found this while searching google earth. i have pictures but cannot load them.
content.summary: Flying disc headed towards a black hole with bright brilliant white lines emmiting from sun. found on google earth.

content.detailedDescription: I drive a taxi in boston i was heading back to my place when i noticed a very bright light of to my east it was clearly visible i thought it was a plane at first.I get to my place and i look and its visible to me again and not moving so now it can't be a plane i don't hear any rotor noise from a helicopter so now i am interested. so i took 6 shoots of it at a good position i watched it from 4:00 am until 4;45am it never moved i was calm,to me it was no big deal but  someone will try to explaine it away. i have no idea what this could be there is no star of any kind in this part of the sky looking east this object to the naked eye was very bright white light it looked very large because of how bright it was,logan international airport is very close to the city so the flight patterns can take a plane over the region and nobody would look twice but this is 4:00am and in the wrong position and its hovering or stationary that's not normal ,  logan's flight path would be out over the water most of the time.
content.summary: I noticed a bright light and tool photos of it

content.detailedDescription: Don't want this to be shared with the public of what i saw that night!
content.summary: Can't put it into words what i saw but felt as if there was something major happening 'military'!!

content.detailedDescription: my son has come to me telling me a female voice calls his name, says it's time to go or to come with 'them'.  he says he has also seen an owl in his room with a 'river of blue light'.  i would later learn he meant 'beam'.  he says he has seen the owl only once more in the bathroom with what he called an "et".  i thought he meant the et from the movie, but he drew it and i drew it, too, from his words and this looks nothing like spielberg's et. this alien looks more like a grey, but with sharp teeth and 'bumps' on the arms.  i am unsure if my son means like muscles or something else.  he said it was about as big as him, so around 38inches at the time. i have asked him countless times how he felt when he saw the owl and then again with the et.  he said scared, but told me the et would not hurt him.  he said he is scared because the et is 'creepy' looking.  he says he is more afraid of the owl, though, than the et. he said he saw the owl and et when he was four.  he will be six in a week, on the 29th.  he said he had a pumpkin nightlight in his room, which tells me this happened around october 2013.  he says he has never seen the owl, et or light again, but still hears the voices.  the only thing i can add is some time ago, actually probably when he four and around the same time line he saw the owl/blue light, i saw a ball, slightly smaller than a volleyball, of golden floating light come out of my son's closed door and float down the hall way.  i remember thinking this is not a dream, but i wasn't panicked and i went right back to bed.  to this day, i wonder what i saw or what was in my son's room.
content.summary: My son saw an owl and blue beam of light and later an owl and et and i saw a glowing gold orb.

content.detailedDescription: Walking out to the car in the morning (4:50am). i was shocked to see a small, black, isocoles shaped triangle craft, "floating" from ne to nw above my house, no more than 150 ft off the ground. the craft was skimming the treetops. maybe was moving at 40mph, i felt like it was too slow for a jet or prop plane to cruise. i saw no exhaust outlets, no propellers, no symbols, no windows. the triangular craft was a black color that was very hard to see. it did have airplane like lights on the corners. small blinking green light on the left rear corner. small blinking red light on the right rear corner. a small constantly on white light was on the forward tip. the craft cruised by - silently - from my right to my left just above the treetops near my house. it was in my sight around 1-3 minutes until i could no longer see it in the distance. the craft was very small. at first i thought it was only 15 ft from front to end, but now i think it was slightly higher and larger. maybe 30 feet from tip to end, 15 feet across the rear edge. no lights or engines or glow was seen on the rear end. was it a drone? if so it was like a strange shaped balloon with unknown means of propultion. why was it displaying airplane/ heliocopter like lights but flying so low to the ground as to not be seen? if this was military, they some type of hover silently technology. i don't even want to consider that it was alien because the thought scares me.
content.summary: Small triangle shape black craft "floated" from ne to nw 100ft above my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a police officer and i was on a scene when i observed a glowing orange orb traveling at an extremely low speed overhead. the object did not make a sound nor did it have any of the usual lights associated with a plane helicopter. both of the aforementioned are extremely common in the area and i am very familiar with both. 
while on scene i took my phone out and recorded 2 videos of it. the first had a flash on, but due to the nature/sensitivity of the scene i quickly turned ended the first video, turned off the flash, then resumed filming. 

****while i do agree to the below terms, i request that if any broadcast is used that the sound of the video be muted.****
content.summary: Police officer on call witnessed

content.detailedDescription:
It was july of 1980 i was 12 yrs old.. i was sitting outside on a retaining wall in my family's driveway roughly 10p it was a unusual quiet night in the neighborhood.. as i was sitting there i noticed what appeared to be firework sparklers..Which i thought the neighbor kids were throwing them over their house came from the far side of the home to the side i was on then towards the ground.. which i couldn't see if they landed cuz of the neighbors to the north was on a hill and their retaining wall hide the last 3ft of ground where the orbs were heading... then they went back up and over the house in single file... and then back to my side again.. after calling out the neighbor kids name i quickly realized there was no one outside.. i remember feeling a little scared as i stood up. 
as i stood up to see if what i thought were sparklers were burning on the ground.. the orbs rose up and hovered roughly 10 ft off the ground.. and in single file took off strait west at a high rate of speed... that's when the fear over came me and i ran in the house as fast as i could to tell my dad.. but he only laughed and said it was my imagination... and was never mentioned again there after... but i know what i saw!!
content.summary: 3 orbs observed

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way upstairs to retire for the night when i noticed a light outside the landing window which is on the back of the house. i thought it might have been a helicopter but it did not sound like one. i looked out of the window and saw four lights and when i looked closer i saw these lights were on each corner of a large square object. it moved quite slowly across the top of the house and as it passed i saw a strip of flashing lights at the back of the object. i called my husband but by this time it had passed to the front of the house. so we ran into the front bedroom and all we could see was the strip of flashing lights at the back of the object. my husband said it seemed to be going in the direction of manchester airport. throughout all the time keeping a steady pace.I was so overwhelmed by this sightings and thought surely i was not the only one who saw this thing so i sent an email to bufora ufo website also to the mail news paper and the manchester evening new also to nick pope but no one has replied to me with any information about weather anyone else had reported it. i know what i saw to be real but without any other witnesses i'm at a loss
content.summary: Large square object flies over the roof of my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my girlfriend house and i went back to my home, suddenly i saw green lights in the sky.
i took out my cell phone and i started recording, i was very excited and terrified, you can see it on the video.
i saw the lights came on and went out, each time in a different place.
after 2 minutes, the lights just disappeared, i was in shock.
in the video i shouted the name of my friend "adiv".
he was not with me, but he and i are interested in ufos and aliens long time.
we see tv shows about ufos and aliens together, a month ago i bought a book called "the journey in for ufos."
the event took place over two minutes, i do not know what it was, the lights did not make a noise.
it was not a plane or a helicopter! ma'aleh adumim has a military base of the israel defense forces.
there are many incidents in ma'aleh adumim. this is not the first time i see this kind of thing, my friends and i saw many times those lights, but only once i managed to film.
i really do not know what it was, today it is one of the biggest questions remains to be explained.
it's really interests me and i hope you come back to me a cell phone or email.
content.summary: I saw green lights in the sky intensified and increased appeared at random locations.

content.detailedDescription:
i often step out of my house around 4-5 am to drink my coffee and see if it looks like it might rain.
 about a month ago, i noticed a shiney cross shaped object in the upper sky. it/they are small to the eye and are different sized/brightness. i think this is do to their altitude. thought they rotate are the earth as the morning arrives, they are not in the exact same location from day to day. they are not visable after the sun comes up.
 as i've stated usually i see on but sometimes i see up to 5 in a sighting.
i am curios as to what they are. please put my mind to rest a tell me what i'm seeing.
content.summary: Shiney cross shaped craft appear in the night sky every morning. sometimes i see up to 5 at a time. i'd like to know what i'm seeing.

content.detailedDescription: It was 8:55 pm on sept.17 15 miles west of eureka kansas on highway 254. looking south i saw three solid bright white lights in a slight angle to each other they appeared to be turning a little more south i thought maybe it was some kind of  military training the way they were lined up it was either three separate object or one huge object as i drove on down the road about a minute later i saw a large orange light in the sky it was rotating clockwise the best way to describe it it look like a lighthouse light it would appear for a couple of seconds you could see it turning then disappear then reappear it did this three times then just completely disappeared this is the first time in my life that i've seen something that i cannot explain
content.summary: 3 bright solid light at slight angle slowly turned and disappeared the a large orange light appeared and was rotating clockwiseit

content.detailedDescription: I was up ,walking around in my house,late,giving my inside cats treatsso they will settle down after,looked out my back patiodoor,i always watch the nite sky,seen this bright huge light out back,not moving,just sittin there like it was watching all,i got my binacalors,and seen the white,red,lights,no beacon,not an airplane,no sound,it set there at least 15 minutes,then a plane comes over about 2 miles west of this bright light.It disappearslike it was never there,gone!!!!!   i was baffled,i know what i saw.Tried to go back to bed,but thought i would do what im doing,report it.Thats all.
content.summary: Looked out back patiodoor about quarter to 1am friday morning,seen this big bright light looking down on my back yard,not moving,,there a big house behind mine,it was in over his frontyard,about 2 miles up

content.detailedDescription: I sit outside n just look at the sky. several times i've noticed that it would be moving at a fast pace.  i would puff on my cig three times and wait it would get closer and then stop and just hover. it looked like something moving and change shapes. so i decided i would try to see if i could make contact. it always gets so close and then just stop n hover.  i would get tired and just give up and leave it hovering like a star. it's always at night.  i love looking at stars and when i seen the strange way it was moving i wanted to see what would happen if i would put my cig in its direction to see if it would keep moving or stop. each time it just stops.  i lose interest because it just stops and hovers. my feelings is excitement.  because if there out there i want to know and see for myself.Ic
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In the night i've been going out and notice in the air something moving fast. but when i would smoke my cig in the direction of object it would move closer and the stop like a star and just hove. it's happen couple of times.

content.detailedDescription: On september 14th, 2015 i was on 7th ave at w20th st in manhattan . the weather was perfectly clear, no clouds, blue fall sky. at approx 1pm i noticed a bright reflection from a jet as it flew from north to south over west manhattan, a common sight as planes climb after leaving laguardia. as it passed overhead i noticed an oddly bright white sphere moving slowly at very high altitude. no blinking lights, like a ping pong ball, just hanging there. it seemed to move slowly side to side, but very still when it stopped.  i assumed i was seeing a large high altitude balloon when suddenly it moved in a wide arc very rapidly across the sky. it was very strange because as it moved it remained flat bright white. i lost view for a second and then saw it at a much higher altitude seconds later moving north west at very high speed. i am fairly familiar with aircraft and have never seen one move like this object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White sphere over hudson river/new york city

content.detailedDescription: It came into view suddenly over the tree tops due south, moved a little to the south and blinked out, then came back moving north to the east of me and blinked out again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing orb that hovered and blinked out 2 or 3 times

content.detailedDescription: I reported a sighting of 6 to 12 ufo's on february 8th 2014 to mufon and every since then i have had anywhere from 6 to 10 ufo's posted around my apartment. the ufo's hovers in various places in the area and small cessna airplanes seem to be keeping and eye on them. on any clear night you can see the ufo's and the cessna's. i have taken many pictures  of these ufo's and would like somebody from mufon to come and check these things out. every since the first sighting these things are making me very nervous and scared. just knowing these things are posted around my apartment is bothering me mentally.
content.summary: Ufo is posted above my apartment every night

content.detailedDescription: At 6:41pm az time, i opened the nasa iss application on my samsung tablet and noticed 2 white orbs/lights while the iss station was directly over the starting of fka ussr. in the screen shots that i captured 1 of the 2 lights remains stationary on the left while the ball of light on the right ejects to the right and maintains straight path leaving the stationary orb remaining to its left. then all of the sudden the iss feed went down.
content.summary: Observed via iss application on my samsung pad

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancé and i were coming home from dinner last friday night going east on kimball bridge rd to turn left on jones bridge. about half to a quarter of a mile before we came to a four way traffic light to turn, she pointed out some orangish lights to our right. 

my perspective on seeing them at first was they were in the sky in an orderly fashion. as we approached the traffic light, the lights continued coming from our right side and they started to become distant from each other. we got to the light and it turned green quickly, maybe 10-15 seconds, we made the left turn and then an immediate right turn into the parking lot of the cvs at the corner of jones bridge and abbotts bridge and watch the lights become more spaced apart and one by one, the lights went out. 

i thought at the light, i may have seen a trail of sorts however, i can't be sure. julie googled "  " unidentified orange lights" and several pictures of lights very similar if not exactly what we saw came up. i dialed 911, told them it was a non-emergency and asked if anyone had called about strange lights. i related my story and the lady kind of chuckled. the next morning, i called and spoke with a woman at the atlanta fox news news desk.
content.summary: Observed 7-8 orange lights moving seemingly in a pattern from my right to left as i faced east. seemed  organized for the first part(45seconds?) then the objects became further apart from each other and one by one, faded out of sight.
